description: Enable AI assistants and applications to seamlessly interact with cross-chain blockchain infrastructure. Access comprehensive token data, bridging tools, transaction tracking, and gas price information through a standardized protocol. Simplify cross-chain operations and enhance blockchain interoperability within your AI workflows.

lifiApiKey.description: API key for LI.FI API authentication

tools.name: lifi_get_chains
tools.description: Get information about all currently supported chains from LI.FI API

chainTypes.description: Optional filter to restrict the resulting chains to specific chainTypes

tools.name: lifi_get_tokens
tools.description: Get information about all supported tokens from LI.FI API

chains.description: Optional comma-separated list of chain ids or keys to filter tokens

chainTypes.description: Optional filter to restrict the resulting tokens to specific chainTypes

minPriceUSD.description: Optional filter by minimum token price in USD (minimum 0, default 0.0001)

tools.name: lifi_get_token
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific token from LI.FI API

chain.description: Chain ID or name where the token exists

token.description: Token address or symbol to get information for

tools.name: lifi_get_tools
tools.description: Get information about all supported tools (bridges and exchanges) from LI.FI API

chains.description: Optional comma-separated list of chain ids or keys to filter tools

tools.name: lifi_get_connections
tools.description: Get information about supported chain connections from LI.FI API

toChain.description: Optional destination chain id or key to filter connections to

toToken.description: Optional destination token address to filter connections

fromChain.description: Optional source chain id or key to filter connections from

fromToken.description: Optional source token address to filter connections

denyBridges.description: Optional comma-separated list of denied bridge keys

allowBridges.description: Optional comma-separated list of allowed bridge keys

denyExchanges.description: Optional comma-separated list of denied exchange keys

allowExchanges.description: Optional comma-separated list of allowed exchange keys

tools.name: lifi_get_gas_prices
tools.description: Get gas price information for a specific chain from LI.FI API

chainId.description: Chain ID to get gas prices for

tools.name: lifi_get_gas_suggestion
tools.description: Get gas amount suggestions for a specific chain from LI.FI API

chain.description: Chain ID or key to get gas suggestions for

fromChain.description: Optional source chain to calculate required fromToken amount

fromToken.description: Optional source token address to calculate required amount

tools.name: lifi_get_transaction_status
tools.description: Get the status of a cross-chain transfer by transaction hash from LI.FI API

txHash.description: Optional transaction hash to check status for

tools.name: lifi_get_integrator_fee_withdrawal
tools.description: Get integrator fee withdrawal transaction for a specific chain from LI.FI API

tokens.description: Optional comma-separated list of token addresses to withdraw

chainId.description: Chain ID to withdraw fees from

integratorId.description: Integrator ID to get fee withdrawal transaction for
